* This is the
* Multitouch project by the-moron.net


* represented by PDXIII and fabiantheblind


* students at the University of Applied Sciences Potsdam (FHP)


* during the class of Till Nagel "Urbane Ebenen" (urban layers).


* the code is available here: Google Code


* or here: GitHub


* a little more documentation will be available @ project.the-moron.net/UELaerm/


* there are 5 packages at this time.
* In interaction we have some transformable objects. Mostly written by Till Nagel for the unfolding project. The class /tmn_UE_Laerm/src/interaction/TNObstacleObject.java is written by PDXIII and extends Tills work.
* In the package old we have... yes old junk that is not used anymore.
* The package particleSystem is based on Daniel Shiffmans Nature Of Code Examples.
* The package tmnuelaerm is the main application and in the package
* util you find some little helpers to make life easier.
have fun!
